name: uninstaller
title: Uninstaller
description: Completely remove applications and their associated files from your system, including preferences, caches, and other related data.
author: ricka7x

commands.name: uninstall-app
commands.title: Uninstall App
commands.subtitle: Remove applications and all related files.
commands.description: Uninstall applications and remove all associated files from your system.

preferences.name: alwaysUseAdmin
preferences.title: Always Use Admin Privileges
preferences.description: Always request administrator privileges when uninstalling apps. If disabled, will only request when needed.

preferences.name: debugMode
preferences.title: Debug Mode
preferences.description: Show detailed logs in Raycast console for troubleshooting.

preferences.name: skipPaths
preferences.title: Skip Paths
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of paths to skip when searching for related files (e.g., /Library/Caches).

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
